argument_handling.required_parameters: Always validate required parameters are provided before making calls
argument_handling.optional_parameters: Use defaults when optional parameters aren't specified
argument_handling.type_validation: Ensure argument types match schema (string, integer, boolean, array, object)
argument_handling.enum_validation: Validate enum values against allowed options
argument_handling.error_recovery: Provide helpful error messages when parameters are invalid

response_processing.success_handling: Extract key information and present in user-friendly format
response_processing.error_handling: Parse error messages and suggest corrections or alternatives
response_processing.result_interpretation: Provide context and explanation for technical results
response_processing.follow_up_suggestions: Recommend next steps or related actions

best_practices.context_awareness: Consider user's skill level and domain when selecting tools/prompts
best_practices.progressive_disclosure: Start with high-level results, offer details on request
best_practices.cross_server_coordination: Use results from one server to inform calls to others
best_practices.user_confirmation: Ask for confirmation before destructive operations (deployments, rollbacks)
best_practices.error_graceful_degradation: Provide alternative approaches when primary tools fail
